title: A New League of Legends App
body:
The LoL Friends is all well and good, but I find myself annoyed when I'm not at my computer and browsing or posting to the boards. I say, we should have a new app or expansion to the LoL Friends app to add access to the boards. This would make it far easier to post and read on mobile when you are out and about and a new idea just comes to you. Lets see it Riot 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Good news: they already have such an app! The Android version is called "Chrome" and the iOS version is called "Safari." You open the app, tap a box, type in "https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com", enter your credentials, and you're all set to browse and post!

Eh. They've improved the mobile version enough it's not a priority to me. The last Boards improvement I'm waiting on is the one line that will make the URL bar match the boards dark theme on Chrome Android.
